name: Super Final Might
description:
This game is a turn based combat game. The idea was to make a mix of 3 games. 

Super Mario World, Final Fantasy and Heroes of might and magic. 

We did not get all 3 games implemented into the game. We wanted to  get the overworld from Mario and then you could select a battle there. In the battle it was the idea to have the turn based combat from Final Fantasy.
